Cooking!

I love cooking. Here are some examples of what I cooked. Unfortunately, I'm not much of an Instagrammer, nor do I post my food on facebook, therefore I don't have many pictures.

    Honey and chilli glazed pork ribs
    Pasta and vegetables salad with mayonnaise and chicken breast pieces
    Young bunny baked with white wine and vegetables
    Indian dinner: Garam masala chickpea, kari chicken and cooked carrot with butter
    When I'm lazy - Instant ramen upgrade
    Sweet snails with vanilla pudding, shredded coconut and chocolate drops
    One pot vegetable spaghetti with a side of chilli chicken breast pieces
    Fried toast rolls filled with fruit and nutella
    Just a simple homemade burger
    Another simple one - extra fluffy pancakes with maple syrup and sour cream
    Waffles with hot fruit, ice cream, whipped cream and chocolate sauce
    Porkloin and prosciutto stumps with butter baked potatoes and onion sauce
    First attempt at homemade sushi - salmon, cucumber, avocado and sesame
    Creamy risotto with cheddar cheese and scallion
    Chicken chilli with corn and fresh peppers
